definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ezr 7:20 rest, remainder (v. BH I. [[שׁאר]]; Eg. Aram. n. [[שאר]] Cooke:203, vb. [[ישתאר]] be left (outstanding) Cooke:404 = S-C:L 9, Chr-Pal. 40r);—´[[שׁ]]: abs. Ezr 4:10 +, cstr. v:Ezr 4:9 +; emph. [[שְׁאָרָא]] Da 7:7, Da 7:19;—of a thing, remainder Ezr 7:18, Ezr 7:20; of cities Ezr 4:10, Ezr 4:17, of persons v:Ezr 4:9, v:Ezr 4:10, v:Ezr 4:17, Ezr 6:16, Da 2:18, of beasts Da 7:7, Da 7:12, Da 7:19.
